title: Twenty Years Since The Enron Collapse
itunes:title: Twenty Years Since The Enron Collapse
description:
December marks twenty years since energy-trading giant Enron filed for bankruptcy. Ed Hirs of the University of Houston details the company's rise and malpractice. Leslie Caldwell, a partner with the law firm Latham & Watkins and who also led a team of investigators and prosecutors in the US Justice Department’s Enron Task Force, discusses investigating Enron. Hosted by Joe Shortsleeve.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
